displayName.text: Mudras Soho - Bespoke Treatments | Expert Massage Therapy for the Body & Soul

formattedAddress: 540 Broadway Suite 312, New York, NY 10012, USA

originalText.text:
I have be a client of Mudras for years yet hadn't been able to carve time in my schedule to prioritize my wellness.  After sustaining a knee injury which has been treated both medically and with PT, I was in need of some additional massage therapy.

Brittany worked out all the knots and issues in both knees, my neck and shoulders.  I feel 5" taller and much looser.

Mudras' style of massage therapy isn't a day at the spa experience - this is deep tissue work and is intended to be a medical massage.  if you are experiencing sore muscles, continual pain or just need a body reset - Mudras is exactly what the doctor ordered.

originalText.text: The BEST massage I’ve ever had. As a professional ballerina, I put my body through so much stress. Every time I see Yotam, I walk in feeling like I’ve been hit by a truck and leave feeling like a new person. He’s so knowledgeable, especially when it comes to dancers and how we use our bodies, that he knows exactly how to treat my issues. If I could give him 10 stars I would!

originalText.text:
I'm Lisa Marie Kocsis, a Pilates instructor, personal trainer and certified nutrition coach. I've been teaching for almost two decades in New York City.
Running my own business demands my complete attention, and doing it in the Big Apple certainly has its stresses!
In addition, I'm constantly training to prepare for various certifications and physical challenges, as fitness is my passion! I always feel better physically and mentally when I have a consistent workout routine. It keeps me centered and balanced and helps to alleviate stress. When training consistently, recovery becomes that much more important. Yotam is a fantastic practitioner! His knowledge of anatomy combined with his incredible massage technique results in an unprecedented experience for his clients! Yotam's body work has helped me tremendously. Tending to your muscle and soft tissue structures is a critically important aspect of recovery. Be sure to experience his work!

originalText.text: I have had the pleasure of working with this legend for over 4 years! Initially introduced for a shoulder issue by a prominent personal trainer in NYC, Yotam had me back in the game in short order; Straightening my crooked a*# out after decades of bad posture was no easy task for his magic hands but now I'm climbing mountains with a 55+ lb pack!! A master of his craft and masseuse extraordinaire - I couldn't recommend him more highly!

originalText.text: In addition to being the best massage therapist in NYC,  Yotam is  also a very kind human being.  His skills have allowed me to move an feel better.  I highly recommend Mudras Soho and can’t wait for my next session.
